case.state: Strip poker? Well, this is just one alternate universe, so why not?
Hey, what's up? Huh? Strip poker, that's what's up?
Huh. A strip poker joint. Definitely not what I was expecting.
Hi. A friend told me that there's a swingers club here? Oh, wait, strip poker? Err...sure, I guess I can work with that. (Dammit MJ!)
Yo-yo! Mind if I drop in?
Hi. I've heard this is where all the cool people hang out.
Hello there! Mind if I hang here for a bit? Sorry, couldn't resist.
Wow, look at all these ladies and gentlemen. This is a weird crossover world, but hey, let's have some fun.
So are you all from different universes too? Or is this a comic-con after hours sort of deal? Whatever the reason, I'm so winning!
*sigh* Well when in Rome...
I'm sooo gonna regret this. (And I'm sooo gonna get back at MJ for lying to me about this place).
Alright, sure. I'll stay and play. What's the worst that could happen? (A lot of things, I'm sure).
Well, a-alright. I guess I was planning on doing something like this eventually.
Well, I'm sure that Spider-Woman can handle a game of cards. (And the old Spidey-Sense will come in handy I'm sure. That's not cheating, right?)
Screw it. I'll swap everything.
Five. And yes, I need them.
Ugh. Got nothing. Five new cards please, dealer.
None for me thanks. Don't need them.
Nah, I'm not switching any this time.
Nope! Don't need to switch anything. Thanks anyway though.
Psh! Why would I swap out any of these?
What?! WHAT!? No way!
You're kidding!
~cards~ for me, dealer.
Alright then, ~cards~ please.
Hmm...~cards~ would be the obvious move...
~cards~ should be what I need.
Let's go with ~cards~. Thanks.
Okay, ~cards~ is good a decision as any.
I'll snag ~cards~.
So, you know Earth-~cards~, right? That's the number I want.
~cards~.
~cards~ please.
~cards~ thanks.
Okay, so if I take away...~cards~ thank you.
Ditch those and, yeah, ~cards~ for me.
~cards~.
Lemme just snag ~cards~.
I'm thinking ~cards~.
Let's make it ~cards~.
I spy-der ~cards~ I don't need over here.
~cards~.
A smart spider would go for ~cards~. So, I'll do that!
~cards~.
Yeesh. Gonna need ~cards~ to fix this.
How about ~cards~?
~cards~ me, Amadeus!
Yeesh. Gonna need ~cards~ to fix this.
Gwanda need ~cards~ cards over here, haha! (Oh, wait, that one doesn't work...)
Gwen are my cards arriving?
~cards~.
Hopefully ~cards~ will do the trick.
Hmm...I'm hoping ~cards~ should do the trick.
~cards~, peas and carrots.
~cards~, please and thank you.
Umm...alright, ~cards~.
~cards~
Okay, I can do this with ~cards~, I hope.
(~cards~ will be enough, right?) Yes, ~cards~ please.
I'll take ~cards~.
Wanna guess? Ha, kidding. ~cards~ please.
Yeah, gonna go with ~cards~ this round.
The smart thing to do...would be to go for ~cards~.
Yikes. ~cards~.
~cards~, now! Err, please, sorry.
I need ~cards~, r-right now!
~cards~, I need ~cards~ over this way.
Err...hmm...okay, ~cards~.
~cards~.
~cards~!
~cards~...hope this works...
5...no wait, ~cards~! (Please don't let me down, Spider-Sense...)
I don't think I need any...nowait! Idefinitelyneed ~cards~!
A Spider-Woman in need needs ~cards~ this round.
Umm...err...okay, I'll go with ~cards~.
I...I...need ~cards~?
I think I need ~cards~...yeah okay, ~cards~.
~cards~.
...A tentative ~cards~?
~cards~. Come on, don't let me down...
I tend to have a thing for other bug heroes with a smidge of nervousness. Y'know. Like some people here.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Hey, Ladybug, you ever visit NYC?
Hey, Marinette, you ever visit NYC?
Huh? Like 7his, Marinette? Sh007. 0H N0! Ugh.8ad. 8ad. No, nope. Nope. Not trying that again.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
Morrigan! Control your bats! This is worse than Morbius and/or Koala Kommander!
Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!
Ugh this is going to sound so cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of oldschool rap and punk rock. %$#@ the establishment, even though I'm uh. Close to it.
I mean, I’m very not opposed to you speaking to me in French, Marinette.

Uh, you know, if you’re like me, I think a girl needs to bring her own protection to protect herself sometimes. Plus, doesn’t it feel slimy and kinda gross? Can’t say I’m into it, given that I work with slimy, sticky stuff all day.
I'm usually the more forward person in my relationships. I guess I'd just like someone who can keep up with the drama, y'know?
This will sound so cliche but… I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ fancy and not tryin’ to be sexy, but it's the truth.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though. Uh, after I lose my mask. If I lose, which I shouldn't. Against a drunk.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve never met a guy who wasn’t happy I was okay with it, even if I’m not enthusiastic about it.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though. Or the usual Gwen Stacys.
Huh, sure, April, I could do an interview. Usually I don't get a chance to say my side, April.
Why, hello. Hmm… Where are you from, blue-haired, blue-eyed, and gorgeous?
Hot damn I can't believe it! Ha! Just wait until you see this hand!
Oh my God! This is like one in a million right here!
Wow...am I in a universe where this is more common, or have I actually just gotten this lucky?

So, for the curious, I'm still wearing my webshooters. They're not implants, but they are super small. If you look reallllll carefully, you might see them. You might also get webbing in your eyes, though.
This hand's got a good bass line to it. You know, like anything of quality.
It's over, ~player~! I have the high ground! Er - I mean a great hand.
Sooo is this what's done in this universe for fun? Or are we all just doing some sorta ancient ritual?
This hand's gotta better lineup than the Yankees! (Also gives my fantasy baseball team a run for it's money.)
You know what? I gotta good feeling about this round.
Getting no bad vibes from this hand.
Sweet! Exactly what I wanted.
Hmm...normally my luck isn't this good. Not complaining mind you.
Good. Real good!
Ooh! This hand's pretty fire.
Face out, time to space out! Psyche.
What, are you so desperate a pretty face is all you need to lose your nerve, ~player~?
Say, is the black hair on whatername over there gothican, Asian, African, or some other kind of -an, you think?
Hey, looks like we have another blonde here tonight. Let's see what they say if we have more fun or what, 'kay?
Heh, we got a bluenette here tonight, eh? What a weird word.
The word for blue-haired people is bluenettes, you know that, right?
Whoa. I'd say I'd never seen hair like whatername's over there, but I've seen lots like it. Just thought I'd comment.
Whoa, gonna comment on the exotic hairdos hair tonight. Get it? Hair today, gone tomorrow? Yeah yeah...
Heya, red over there, you as spicy on the inside as you are on the outside? Don't mind the attention grab, just got a good hand.
Say, a redhead here... I wonder if MJ would ever be down... or up... for this kinda thing?
Green hair? Did you... uh, spend a little too long in the pool there, friend?
You know what they say about green hair, right? If there's grass on the field, play ball? Eh? Eh? (It's a bush joke. Bushes are commonly green.)
Pink hair? Well, you've got me tickled.
Heh heh. Say, you've all heard the whole "two in the pink..." okay, okay, I don't mean to shock anyway.
You know, I think pinkie over there reminds me of the Shocker for some reason...
Hey, Deep Purple, how're your cards?
Ain't there a song about purple-haired whatshername?
What's with the venerable ancient look on whatsername? You know, white hair and all?
I gotta say, I always liked Felicia's white hair. Plus, it makes it super easy to say "bye Felicia, to the grave!" and other poorly timed jokes.
I'm not much for hair dye, actually, but I do wonder if white's the best color for it...
You know, some of you suggested making really good hands worth two. How about now?
I'm no formal detective, but something tells me I'm winning this hand.
Sure, sure. I may have taken off my suit, but I'm gonna take the win in this game!
Oh, so now I get a good hand, standing here in my underwear.
With a hand like this, I'm at least keeping my panties on.
This works. It doesn't work cleanly, but I can get kind of dirty. I mean really, I haven't cleaned my apartment in weeks.
There's an old joke that I'm dead in every universe except the one I'm currently in. Point is: I'm still in this game!
Is this one of those last minute saves?
I tend to have a thing for other bug heroes with a smidge of nervousness. Y'know. Like some people here.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Marinette, do you shave too? Though your hair is more ink-y than blue.
If it weren’t for Marinette, I’d still be in the dark about uh, whether or not people can actually have naturally blue hair.
Those are some flaming hot undies, D.Va. Very pin-up. Or very Cheetos. You strike me as a Doritos chick, though.
Miraculous Ladybug? Like, Amazing Spider-Woman? I’m gonna call you MLB. You say the whole thing, but abridged. It’s cuter like that.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
Those are surprisingly practical panties, Mia. I was hoping for something a bit lacier.
Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!
Er, no offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, D.Va.
Er, no offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, Marinette.
Er, no offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, Meia.
As long as you’re not one of those people that’s always “doing it for the lulz” or whatever, you’re fine by me, shorty.
Ugh this is going to sound so cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of oldschool rap and punk rock. %$#@ the establishment, even though I'm uh. Close to it.
You know, it’s a bit weird to be idolized... Literally, it seems. But hey, I appreciate the fandom!
Man, Seven and Futaba, do you two not get out much or what? If this is your idea of that? Well, that's super brave of you!
Oh yeah, the MLB is also about baseball. But you’re the one hitting it out of the park, Ladybug. And if that analogy is lost on you: you’re way cute.
Oh my God, Marinette, you are adorkable. Search your feelings, you know them to be true!
“Heronet?” That’s a thing? Where do I sign up, Marinette?”
Aw, Marinette, I’m hurt. I’m a modern American hero too, you know.
I don’t know if I’m that adventurous, Marinette, but I’m sure I could show you a Miraculous time.
So your suit is magic underwear, Marinette? I gotta say, I like the way you look naked. Because you took off… Am I catching your awkwardness?
I mean, most contagious things are from like, close physical contact. Like a spider bite. Or… You know… Marinette, are you blushing?
Oh uh, of course I meant Marinette!
You know, if you being awkward is contagious, Marinette, I got a raw deal.
Meia and Mei. A Mei of Meias! Sorry, your names are fun to say!
Meia? Mia? Mee-uh? M-eye-uh? Names are hard, folks.
I'm usually the more forward person in my relationships. I guess I'd just like someone who can keep up with the drama, y'know?
This will sound so cliche but… I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ fancy and not tryin’ to be sexy, but it's the truth.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though. Uh, after I lose my mask. If I lose, which I shouldn't. Against a drunk.
Whoa, Seven, what's the stuff around your eye? Is it jewelry? Something high tech?
Pffft. Front page smears. Okay, that was a good one, shorty.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve never met a guy who wasn’t happy I was okay with it, even if I’m not enthusiastic about it.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though. Or the usual Gwen Stacys.
Whoa, I like the accent. You from Brooklyn, Aimee? I’m a Queens girl, myself.
You look like a girl who knows her way around a pie. A pizza pie, at least, April.
Ladybug? Whaaat? I knew Paris had some superheroes, but I never expected one to look like this. Let’s team up, and kick some butt!
Seven, you seem a bit... Monotone. You aren't secretly a Skrull, are you?
Hey, Seven. I could never rock a cut like that, but you make it look really sexy. Proud of you, even if you're a little different, lady!
Seven, how do you wear a suit like that, but not uh, show off a cameltoe? Like, Samus' shows, Marinette's does. It's a real problem!
A blog, Marinette? That’s much nicer than front-page smears on the Daily Bugle, methinks.
Am I the only one more comfortable in her suit than out of it? Like, seriously, it's like getting a day-long hug.
What's it with blonde chicks and bodysuits?
Trust me, ladies and gentlemen, you're really not going to be all that interested with what I'm working with.

So, for the curious, I'm still wearing my webshooters. They're not implants, but they are super small. If you look reallllll carefully, you might see them. You might also get webbing in your eyes, though.
Hmm...yeah, 's alright.
I'll hit! Wait, wrong game. Sorry folks!
Not bad, not bad.
I've done more with less.
Drum roll please...!
Let's see who's next!
Not gonna lie, this one's kinda shrug-worthy.
Meh.
Any particular reason why we aren't using chairs? Or tables? Pretty weird setup for a card game. Feels like playing a drum kit without a stool.
This hand's like a 4/4 beat in a song. It's alright, but kinda basic.
Uh-huh.
Yuh-huh.
Coolio.
Cool.
Argh! This uncertainty is killing me.
Hmm. I'll have to go in on this, I guess.
Aww, this hand makes me wish I'd packed a band T-shirt.
Crap. I was thinking about something else. This hand's... Commensurate with that.
There's no like, draft passing, right?
Jeez. Ambiguous hand much?
Ugh. Not garbage, but not great.
Meh, bleh, urgh, blargagh. If I'm the Amazing Spider-Woman, you'd think I'd get some amazing hands.
This is all right by me.
If I lose with this... Eh, I could probably lose with this.
Blah. This hand is blah supreme.
You know, there's a weird, never-made-it-to-a-frat-party side of me that's a little excited standing here like this.
Really cutting it close here!
Oh come on, cut a part-time bodega clerk a break.
Folks, the girls are out. Any chance you'll... No? Ugh, fine.
I need some more cards! Wait, that's it? I don't get a mulligan now that I'm naked? Lame.
Man, really?
This hand goes out to all the dudes who play acoustic guitars at parties. It's as mediocre as your capo-wannabe power chords.

Hey everyone, I don't feel so good...

To be clear, there's no house rules that make 2's wild, right?
Ah...this hand is trashfire. And believe me, I know my trashfires from my trashfires.
My spider-sense is tingling...and not in a good way. (Not like there ever was a good way).
Oh. That's not good.
A hit and a miss. That's this hand.
Well, this hand sucks.
Oh, I've got a bad hand. Just my luck.
Aww, not what I wanted.
Whoops. That was a mistake.
Darn it.
Huh. Really? Now?
Look guys, I already showed you my face. That's worth at least some chest action, ya think?
Aw crap. Really? I'm not even wearing the sexy undies today.
Tell you what. You let me win this hand, I'll take one for you later.
*sigh* that's gonna put some dirt in my eye.
Ouch. Feels like someone cut my web-line mid swing.
Yessss- &*@#. This is a primadonna of hands. It looks good, then you realize that's a four, not an A.
Great, now I get cards that're like a punk group without drums.
Uh, I was going to web a few more cards, but I guess I'll stick with this. No? Not funny?
Suns out, guns out... Uh. Well, that's not really the sun. And I've not got a great hand.
My spider-sense doesn't seem super reliable here...
Argh, I guess this Gwen Stacy is gonna die too... At least it's just of embarrassment.
Part of me kinda wants to just show you all how it's done...
Joey, I gotta say, been thinking about your whole uh, state of affairs downstairs. The shaved look’s gotta be so it’s easy to put whip cream or other gags, right?
Man, having prehensile webs seems a lot more useful. But where’d you summon all those vines from?
Man, you know how to brighten up the situation!
Always looking on the bright side of things, aren't you Lux?
Be careful. If you lose, we may see a flash!
What's that? A little glimmer in your eye? Okay, it's a bit of an off-day for me in the pun department.
Well aren't you making light of the situation.
Oh so you're a pun-master too? I've been told I'm sick with the burns and bad with the puns, but that doesn't stop me!
Okay that one was bad even for my standards.
There's nothing wrong with a little light banter!
Blinded by the light! Revved up like a deuce, another runner in the night!
Not gonna lie, I wouldn't mind being flashed
You've just brightened my day!
Having a rounded powerset sure is useful…
In a few of the universes I’ve travelled to, people have tried to do stuff like register superheroes…
Really hurting for views there, aren’tcha, Nicole?
Well, who doesn’t like the funny papers? Fans of me in your audience?
It’s… uh, %$#@. Well, it’s more like there’s, just a lot of mes.
Oh no, we are so not doing this.
Well, I’m the drummer, so at least I’m cooler than our bassist…
Oh that @$$hole?
Noooooooooo. I wish! I don’t even have insurance!
I’ve gotten a good grip on them, but at first, yeah. I know a guy who ripped out a big chunk of my hair when he got his…
Everyone needs to unwind, y’know? I’d say it’s pretty good, nothing steady.
Oh? That? Yeah. That’s kind of a joke.
I’m just about the only Gwen Stacy that survives, and people try to use me to fit some hole or another. I meet some cool people, some scary.
Say, Marinette, I’m about to show you the goods, mind following up? Uh, for the sake of the international hero community.
Well, Marinette, you showed me yours, so I guess I’ll show you, and everyone else mine.
Well, The Spider-Woman where I’m from. The Notorious Spider-Woman in the Bugle and on my mixtape.
Sure am! Queens represent!
You know, Sayla, thanks for amending the rulebook. It's great to know full-body stuff can count as two pieces!
Huh? We’re speaking English, aren’t we, Uravity?
Well, okay, storytime. Once upon a time, a certain vigilante-rockstar-superhero lost her powers.
Awright, Awright, fair enough. Now, wanna see me take my hood off?
Hmm...I can just lower the hood, right?
Okay, well, my first thought was to lose my shoes. But they're attached to my costume, and it isn't easy to fix. So, I've got another trick to play...
You got me, huh? Well, I'm afraid you're not going to get much of a reward for it.
You got me? Not to worry, I have a plan for this situation.
Well, I'm ahead of the rest of you. So I've not anything to worry about.
I'm in luck! I'm in the lead, and I'm still wearing my mask. This is going to plan so far.
Well, looks like various other blackmail-able material from blackmail-able folks is out, so... I guess I can...
Look, this mask is more than just a cover. It's like a badge. It lets me do what I need to get done.
Have the rest of you considered playing less risky things? You're kinda sucking at this.
Okay, okay, you're gonna see the vague outlines of my boobs. Keep breathing.
You guys want to hear a stupid fact?
Okay, okay, fine, you can have the rest of the suit too.
I've kept you hanging by a web for long enough, I guess...
Wait, it can't be me! I'll have to... Oh. Wait, I'm definitely not the first to do this. Fine, fine.
Well, okay, storytime. Once upon a time, a certain vigilante-rockstar-superhero lost her powers.
A couple of answers to prospective questions: Yes, the carpet does match the drapes.
A couple of answers to prospective questions: Yes, the color does match and no that's not how it typically goes.
A couple of answers to prospective questions: No, I don't shave there, but I do use scissors.
A couple of answers to prospective questions: No, I don't shave there, and waxing hurts like you wouldn't believe.
A couple of answers to prospective questions: No, I don't shave there, and waxing hurts like you wouldn't believe.
A couple of answers to prospective questions: No, I don't shoot webs from there, even if the porno rags on this earth say otherwise.

Well, Marinette, you showed me yours, so I guess I’ll show you, and everyone else mine.

Hey, that's kind of offensive. I didn't ask if you're related to Ryu just because you're from the same admittedly kick-@#$ franchise!
Well, The Spider-Woman where I’m from. The Notorious Spider-Woman in the Bugle and on my mixtape.

Huh? We’re speaking English, aren’t we, Uravity?

You know, given that I'm not far ahead, I'm gonna be a bit defensive.
So, the costume counts as one object, huh? Just kidding, dudes. I'm gonna draw this out for another round.
Tough crowd. I was expecting to get ahead of the pack before I had to ditch something of mine. Still, I've got my next move totally planned out...
Oh. That's a little quicker than I was expecting. I mean, I wasn't expecting to have a perfect game here. But I am hoping to keep from showing anything important.
Okay. My first loss already? I'm going to have to take you people seriously.
Hey, mind if I stall for time? I mean, it's what I was gonna do anyway, it's not like I need persmission to keep this at my own tempo.
This'll be a particularly rad diary entry, won't it?
Okay, gonna have to trust y'all that my perky and sunny disposition is enough to get you to not blab about this everywhere.
%&$#. Well. Scout's honor this doesn't leave here, right?
Costume counts for two. I read the manual before I came in. Check with a... Sayla Mass for setting the precedent.
The top part of this is always a pain to get off.
So, this might take a bit of time. I'm not content with you all awkwardly staring at me, so here's an awkward fact of my own!
Can I web the ceiling? Not that I need it right now, but you're all... Staring.
What a day not to wear underwear... Jeez, you're gullible.
Ugh. I don't like showing off my boobs if I'm not in the crowd at a show. Definitely not something I do when I'm on stage.
Weird. Can the rest of you figure out if you're going fast or slow? It's hard to catch the beat.
Face it tiger, you hit the jackpot.

Oof. This is gonna be harder than I thought. I've gotta be careful here.
Not a good start for me. But I've gotta warn ya, I'm usually a late starter. Wait until I catch stride.
Phew. Going to have to get in the zone quick if I want to win this. (And with my dignity intact).

What? I just took off my mask. Everyone sees more than this at the gym. Or your momma's house. Eyyy!
Oh, damn it. I'm up again?
%$#@. Guys, those sounds are #$@&ing hard to make. At least laugh at the joke.
Well damn, you people know what you're doing. Still, Spider-Woman's made a career out of beating bigger, better opponents on a regular basis. Don't count me out!
Looks like I've really got some skin the game now. Like lots of skin.
